documentation.metadescription: KoolForm is a great form manager which can help you to unload tasks when deal with form. First, it helps you to style/skin your form so that your form appears consistent in all browsers. KoolForm also provides advanced controls such as textbox, button, dropdown, validator so that you can save huge amount of time for your important matters. KoolForm can be integrated seamlessly into your page without any changes to your existing page's layout.

property.name: id
property.shortdesc: Get the id of checkbox object.
property.longdesc: Get the id of checkbox object.

property.name: Text
property.shortdesc: Set the text that goes with checkbox.
property.longdesc: Set the text that goes with checkbox.
property.samplecode:
<?php		
	$chkAgree = $myform_mananger->AddControl(new KoolCheckBox("chkAgree"));
	$chkAgree->Text = "I agree with the term and condition.";
?>

property.name: Selected
property.shortdesc: Get or set the value of checkbox.
property.longdesc: Get or set the value of checkbox. This variable will reflect the selection of checkbox.
property.samplecode:
<?php		
	$chkAgree = $myform_mananger->AddControl(new KoolCheckBox("chkAgree"));
	$chkAgree->Text = "I agree with the term and condition.";
	$chkAgree->Selected = false;
?>

method.name: Render
method.samplecode:
